directions: Place bacon in a large, deep skillet. Cook over medium high heat until evenly brown. Drain, crumble and set aside.
In a medium bowl, combine peas, celery, scallions and sour cream.  Toss gently to mix.
Just before serving, stir in cashews and bacon into salad. Season with salt and pepper.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen green peas, thawed and drained
title: Carmel's Crunchy Pea Salad
